sentences: Ympyrän keskipiste on yleensä merkitty O-kirjaimella.
Ympyrän säde on puolet sen halkaisijasta.
context: The word ympyrä refers to a geometric shape where every point on the circle is equidistant from a central point called the center. It is commonly used in mathematics, design, and everyday language to describe something that is round or curved.
